overview: Having lost his father, 12-year-old Farhad lives with his mother and little sister in the village of Nahooj. Drawn to photography and the magazines he can get his hands on, Farhad sells one of his sheep to buy a second-hand camera. His mother finds out and demands that he return it and get a refund. A driver secretly in love with her will help Farhad with his adventure.
title: Here My Village
